Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[15:8] - - - -
[7:0] OSR_POWER rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

OSR_POWER

OSR power - configures ADC to have an oversampling ratio of 2^OSR_POWER. This allows an OSR of up to 256.
